data.eml:eml: A first record of Cretaceous aphids (Hemiptera, Sternorrhyncha, Aphidomorpha) in Australia, from the Lower Cretaceous Koonwarra Fossil Bed, Victoria

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martin, Sarah K., Skidmore, Luke I., Stilwell, Jeffrey D. (2016): A first record of Cretaceous aphids (Hemiptera, Sternorrhyncha, Aphidomorpha) in Australia, from the Lower Cretaceous Koonwarra Fossil Bed, Victoria. Zootaxa 4137 (1): 95-107, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4137.1.7
